page.title: 20SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: The school year is highlighted by a variety of events: During the Summer term the children all go on a SCHOOL TRIP: last year the children went to the canal in Skipton for a trip on a barge. This year they visited Scarhouse Resevoir A SUMMER FAIR is held every year in July. This year it was called the Medieval Fair;there were lots of stalls with things for sale, games to play and strawberry and cream teas to eat. SPORTS' DAY is held in the last week of the summer term and everyone partakes in the races including the Mums and Dads and the under 5s. A CHRISTMAS CONCERT is held in December-a nativity or a musical show, and Christmas Carols are sung to the old people of the village
